title: enna tAn mAyam
sahitya:
enna tAn mAyam irukkudaDi kannan isaindiDum vEnkuzhal tAn idayam urukkudaDi


anupallavi

  innalum marakkuadaDi inbamum surakkudaDi eNNiDum pOdil avan paNNisai olikkudaDi


caraNam    maduvuNDa vaNDAi mayangiDa sheigudaDi malarkkaNNan gAnam manattinai aLLudaDi
pudup-pudu eNNangaL polivuDan tOnrudaDi bhuvattin uyirgaLukku bOdhaiyai UTTudaDi
